title: 关于BC服玩家连接的问题
author: SunnyDream
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sakura_End 于 2019-1-28 20:19 编辑 

BC配置截图：
ip_forward: false
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: 987a3e9c-8855-4bbd-96b4-09ef102e3911
groups:
  FunnGod:
  - admin
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: |
      &f            &c&l>>>>>&d&l梦&c&l想&2&l星&b&l辰 &r&m&l--- &6&l群组服&c&l<<<<<
      &f            &d&l&k5&r&6&l>>> &a&l小游戏 生存 RPG &6&l<<<&d&l&k5&r
    address: localhost:25564
    restricted: false
  PVP:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25563
    restricted: false
  BED:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25562
    restricted: false
  KIT:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:1900
    restricted: false
  UHC:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:1800
    restricted: false
  SC:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:1600
    restricted: false
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
listeners:
- query_port: 25565
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts: {}
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  max_players: 500
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
prevent_proxy_connections: false
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- help
connection_throttle: 4000



开服了以后玩家进不去
求大佬们帮我解答这个问题
Thanks?(?ω?)?

replies.author: minecraft65536
replies.txt_content: 图二是连接超时，网络问题或服务器地址端口输入有误

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: ip_forward: 和子服spigot.yml里面的bungeecord打开

replies.author: SunnyDream
replies.txt_content:
HTL9257 发表于 2019-1-28 19:53
ip_forward: 和子服spigot.yml里面的bungeecord打开
你好 我按照你说的做修改成true 后 玩家还是进不去 请问我还需要提供些什么??
